data.actual_result: It gets truncated with just 2 dots which makes it look like the server name gets truncated before the member count in the modal.
data.expected_result: It gets truncated with 3 dots like at every other place.
data.short_description: The server name in the invite modal gets truncated with just 2 dots.
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy an invite for a server with a long name. - Send it in any channel/DM. - Observe the number of dots beside the server name.
